name: Poppy Seed Bread
ingredients: 1 1/2 tsp. salt 1 1/2 C. oil 1/2 c. orange juice concentrate
3 eggs 1 1/2 C. milk 1 c. powder sugar
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder 1 Tbsp. poppy seeds 1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 tsp. almond flavoring 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla 1/2 tsp. almond flavoring
steps: Mix together wet and then add dry ingredients. Pour into greased and floured pans.
Bake at 350 for 45-­‐50 min. Toothpick test. Prick the bread several times and then
pour glaze over the bread while hot.
